data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh to strong northeast monsoon will affect the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. With the monsoon moderating, the weather will be warm during the day over the region on Wednesday. Under the influence of a replenishment of the monsoon, temperatures will fall appreciably over the coast of southern China during Christmas holidays. It will be cool in the morning and at night over the region and cold over inland areas. A dry monsoon will bring mainly fine weather to Guangdong over the weekend. The temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over inland areas.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251222","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Cloudy periods in the morning and at night.
